name: Settlement Oracles
description: To give the settlement additional detail, roll on the @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.ironswornoracles.85c04b5267a460ca]{Location Descriptor} oracle. To spark an idea for an event or feature related to the settlement, roll on the @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.ironswornoracles.cb521e4b4d1c2d15]{Action} and @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.ironswornoracles.3c1a7f81062a8a8a]{Theme} oracles.
